dsOverview.title: Summer Monsoon Experiment (SMONEX), 1979May-Jul

summary.p: Data from the Summer Monsoon Experiment, collected by NCAR, NASA, NOAA and France. The project area was over Saudi Arabia, the Arabian Sea, and the Bay of Bengal.
